meta.title: Comprehensive BPHS Dasha Rules v1.0
meta.basis: Bṛhat Parāśara Horā Śāstra Ch. 47-48 (R. Santhanam, Vol. II)

source_reference.exact_quote: During the Dasa of the Sun, there is acquisition of wealth, great felicity and honours from Government, if at the time of birth the Sun be in his own sign, in his sign of exaltation, in a kendra, in the 11th, be associated with the lord of the 9th or the 10th and strong in his Varga.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Complete Sun mahadasha effects with dignity variations

rules.summary: Sun mahadasha (6 years) activates leadership, authority, government relations, father themes, and personal recognition based on Sun's natal dignity and placement

impact.positive_manifestation: Government honors, wealth acquisition, son/children blessings, elephant/vehicle gains, high positions like Army Chief, agricultural products, conveyances, and paternal support when Sun is dignified
impact.negative_manifestation: Government punishment, exile, defamation, kinsmen opposition, father's distress, home troubles, paternal/maternal uncle issues, anxiety, and enmity when Sun is debilitated or afflicted
impact.neutral_manifestation: Mixed results with moderate authority gains and occasional challenges depending on transits and antardashas

strength_variations.exalted: Maximum government favor, highest positions, exceptional wealth gains
strength_variations.own: Strong authority, good government relations, steady wealth growth
strength_variations.friend: Supportive authority figures, moderate gains, helpful mentors
strength_variations.enemy: Authority conflicts, government troubles, reduced gains
strength_variations.debilitated: Severe government issues, health problems, father's suffering

timing_variations.early_dasha: Effects manifest based on Sun's drekkana - 1st drekkana shows early results

primary_actions: Seek government positions or recognition during favorable Sun periods
Strengthen father relationships and paternal connections
Invest in agricultural products, gold, or authority-related ventures
Maintain ethical standards to avoid government troubles
Schedule important announcements during strong Sun transits

timing_guidance.optimal: During Sun's exaltation transit (March-April), own sign periods, and favorable antardashas
timing_guidance.avoid: During Sun's debilitation (September-October), eclipse periods, and malefic antardashas

source_reference.exact_quote: During the Dasa of the Moon there will be acquisition of wealth, grains, clothes, ornaments, women, fragrant articles, flowers etc. if the Moon be waxing, be in her own sign, in her sign of exaltation or in a kendra.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Complete Moon mahadasha effects with lunar phases and dignity considerations

rules.summary: Moon mahadasha (10 years) governs emotions, home, mother, liquids, real estate, public relations, and mental peace based on lunar strength and phases

impact.positive_manifestation: Wealth through liquids/agriculture, grain acquisition, beautiful clothes/ornaments, female support, fragrant articles, flowers, land gains, maternal blessings, and public favor when Moon is waxing and dignified
impact.negative_manifestation: Mental distress, mother's troubles, water-related problems, emotional instability, loss of reputation, wandering tendencies, and health issues when Moon is waning or afflicted
impact.neutral_manifestation: Fluctuating results with periodic gains and losses, emotional ups and downs

strength_variations.waxing_exalted: Maximum gains in real estate, exceptional maternal support, public acclaim
strength_variations.waxing_own: Strong emotional stability, good home comforts, steady liquid gains
strength_variations.waning_debilitated: Severe mental distress, mother's suffering, water-related calamities
strength_variations.new_moon: New beginnings but with initial struggles

primary_actions: Invest in real estate, agriculture, or liquid-related businesses
Strengthen mother relationships and home environment
Maintain regular sleep and emotional wellness routines
Time important decisions during waxing moon periods
Develop public relations and community connections

source_reference.exact_quote: During Mars dasha, if Mars is in exaltation, own sign, or kendra, there will be acquisition of lands, villages, wealth, grains, and victory over enemies.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Complete Mars mahadasha effects including Manglik considerations

rules.summary: Mars mahadasha (7 years) activates courage, property, siblings, conflicts, surgery, engineering, and military themes based on Mars dignity and house placement

impact.positive_manifestation: Land acquisition, village ownership, wealth through property, grain profits, enemy victory, brother support, engineering success, military honors, and surgical healing when Mars is dignified
impact.negative_manifestation: Property disputes, sibling conflicts, accidents, surgery complications, legal battles, fire hazards, blood disorders, and marital discord when Mars is afflicted or in Manglik positions

strength_variations.exalted: Maximum property gains, exceptional courage, military success
strength_variations.own: Strong real estate profits, good sibling relations, engineering achievements
strength_variations.debilitated: Property losses, accident proneness, sibling troubles, health issues

primary_actions: Invest in real estate, construction, or engineering ventures
Strengthen sibling relationships and resolve conflicts
Maintain physical fitness and safety protocols
Channel aggression into productive competition
Address Manglik doshas through appropriate remedies

source_reference.exact_quote: During Rahu dasha, if Rahu is in exaltation or associated with benefics, there will be acquisition of elephants, horses, wealth, grains, and royal favor.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Complete Rahu mahadasha effects including foreign and unconventional gains

rules.summary: Rahu mahadasha (18 years) brings unconventional gains, foreign connections, technology, sudden elevation, and material ambitions with potential for deception when afflicted

impact.positive_manifestation: Foreign wealth, technological gains, sudden elevation, elephant/horse acquisition, royal favor, unconventional success, and material prosperity when Rahu is well-placed
impact.negative_manifestation: Deception, legal troubles, foreign complications, health issues, mental disturbance, addiction tendencies, and reputation damage when Rahu is afflicted

strength_variations.exalted: Maximum foreign gains, exceptional technological success
strength_variations.with_benefics: Balanced unconventional growth with ethical foundation
strength_variations.afflicted: Severe deception, legal troubles, health complications

primary_actions: Explore foreign markets and international opportunities
Invest in technology, innovation, or unconventional ventures
Maintain ethical standards to avoid deception
Regular health checkups for mysterious ailments
Document all agreements to prevent legal issues

source_reference.exact_quote: During Jupiter dasha, if Jupiter is in exaltation, own sign, or kendra, there will be acquisition of wealth, learning, sons, and royal favor.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Complete Jupiter mahadasha effects including wisdom and progeny themes

rules.summary: Jupiter mahadasha (16 years) expands wisdom, wealth, children, teaching, spirituality, and divine grace based on Jupiter's dignity and house placement

impact.positive_manifestation: Wealth acquisition, learning advancement, son/children blessings, royal favor, teaching opportunities, spiritual growth, and divine protection when Jupiter is dignified
impact.negative_manifestation: Over-expansion, legal troubles, children's problems, loss of wealth through poor judgment, and spiritual confusion when Jupiter is afflicted

primary_actions: Pursue higher education, certifications, or teaching roles
Invest in ethical businesses and long-term growth
Strengthen relationships with children and mentees
Engage in charitable activities and spiritual practices
Seek wise counsel before major decisions

source_reference.exact_quote: During Saturn dasha, if Saturn is in exaltation, own sign, or associated with benefics, there will be acquisition of lands, servants, and wealth through perseverance.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Complete Saturn mahadasha effects including karmic themes and delays

rules.summary: Saturn mahadasha (19 years) tests patience, discipline, and karmic debts while rewarding persistent effort with lasting gains in property and status

impact.positive_manifestation: Land acquisition, servant/employee gains, wealth through perseverance, lasting achievements, and karmic rewards when Saturn is dignified
impact.negative_manifestation: Delays, obstacles, health issues, servant troubles, property disputes, and karmic penalties when Saturn is afflicted

primary_actions: Focus on long-term goals requiring patience and persistence
Invest in real estate, agriculture, or traditional businesses
Maintain discipline in health, work, and spiritual practices
Address karmic debts through service and charity
Build systematic approaches to overcome obstacles

source_reference.exact_quote: During Mercury dasha, if Mercury is in exaltation, own sign, or associated with benefics, there will be acquisition of learning, wealth through trade, and success in communications.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Complete Mercury mahadasha effects including commerce and communication themes

rules.summary: Mercury mahadasha (17 years) enhances communication, commerce, learning, writing, and analytical abilities with gains through intellectual pursuits

impact.positive_manifestation: Learning advancement, trade profits, communication success, writing achievements, analytical breakthroughs, and intellectual recognition when Mercury is dignified
impact.negative_manifestation: Communication problems, trade losses, learning difficulties, nervous disorders, and analytical confusion when Mercury is afflicted

primary_actions: Develop communication skills and writing abilities
Engage in trade, commerce, or analytical work
Pursue learning opportunities and skill development
Maintain clear documentation and communication
Network with intellectuals and business professionals

source_reference.exact_quote: During Ketu dasha, there will be spiritual inclination, detachment from worldly pleasures, and gains through occult knowledge when Ketu is well-placed.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Complete Ketu mahadasha effects including spiritual and detachment themes

rules.summary: Ketu mahadasha (7 years) promotes spiritual growth, detachment, occult knowledge, and liberation from material attachments with potential isolation

impact.positive_manifestation: Spiritual advancement, occult knowledge, detachment benefits, liberation experiences, and inner peace when Ketu is well-placed
impact.negative_manifestation: Isolation, confusion, material losses, health issues, and spiritual delusion when Ketu is afflicted

primary_actions: Focus on spiritual practices and inner development
Study occult sciences and metaphysical subjects
Practice detachment from material outcomes
Engage in meditation and contemplative practices
Seek guidance from spiritual teachers

source_reference.exact_quote: During Venus dasha, if Venus is in exaltation, own sign, or associated with benefics, there will be acquisition of wealth, beautiful wife, ornaments, and artistic success.
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Complete Venus mahadasha effects including relationship and artistic themes

rules.summary: Venus mahadasha (20 years) enhances relationships, artistic abilities, luxury, beauty, and material comforts with potential for indulgence when afflicted

impact.positive_manifestation: Wealth acquisition, beautiful spouse, ornament gains, artistic success, luxury enjoyment, and harmonious relationships when Venus is dignified
impact.negative_manifestation: Relationship troubles, artistic failures, luxury losses, health issues related to indulgence, and material attachment when Venus is afflicted

primary_actions: Cultivate artistic skills and creative expression
Invest in beauty, luxury goods, or entertainment industries
Strengthen romantic and business partnerships
Maintain balance between pleasure and responsibility
Develop aesthetic sense and refined tastes

source_reference.interpretation_notes: Specific combination effects of moon sub-period within sun major period

impact.positive_manifestation: Harmonious blend of sun and moon qualities producing balanced results
impact.negative_manifestation: Conflicting energies between sun and moon creating internal tension
impact.neutral_manifestation: Mixed results with moon modifying sun themes

Balance sun goals with moon methods

rules.summary: Moon antardasha in Jupiter mahadasha creates blended effects of jupiter and moon energies

impact.positive_manifestation: Harmonious blend of jupiter and moon qualities producing balanced results
impact.negative_manifestation: Conflicting energies between jupiter and moon creating internal tension
impact.neutral_manifestation: Mixed results with moon modifying jupiter themes

primary_actions: Focus on moon-related activities within jupiter framework
Balance jupiter goals with moon methods
Monitor moon transits for optimal timing

source_reference.exact_quote: Effects of first lord dasha
source_reference.interpretation_notes: Comprehensive effects when first house lord runs its dasha period

rules.summary: Dasha of first house lord activates self, health, personality, and life direction with results depending on lord's dignity and placement

impact.positive_manifestation: Enhanced self, health, personality, and life direction when lord is dignified
impact.negative_manifestation: Challenges in self, health, personality, and life direction when lord is afflicted
impact.neutral_manifestation: Mixed results in self, health, personality, and life direction areas

primary_actions: Focus on self, health, personality, and life direction development
Strengthen 1th house significations
Address any 1th house related challenges
